Houston.One City Centre: One Brickell City Centre is a proposed 80 story, 1,049 ft (320m) mixed-use skyscraper in the city of Miami, Florida. If built it would be the tallest building in the Southeastern United States, surpassing the Bank of America Plaza in Atlanta. It would also surpass the height of the not yet constructed One Bayfront Plaza, which is approved at 1,010ft (308m) tall.
